# VEHICLE::SET_FORCE_VEHICLE_ENGINE_DAMAGE_BY_BULLET

## Summary
Force the engine to be damaged when vehicle gets hit by bullet at any position

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** forceEngineDamage
